title: Mahathir running down nation with false claim, says PM’s aide - Nation | The Star Online
text:
pic ) has run down the nation with his claim that Malaysia has become one of the 10 most corrupt countries in the world, said an aide to the Prime Minister. 
’s latest findings listing Malaysia as the 55th least corrupt country in the world. 
Why else would he say Malaysia was in the top 10 of the most corrupt countries when it is in the top third least corrupt countries?” he said in a statement here yesterday. 
“U-turn” that Dr Mahathir stated anymore. 
’s Lim Kit Siang for being dangerous to the Malays. 
These U-turns by Dr Mahathir are very strange,” said Tengku Sariffuddin, adding that this was pointed out by the Sultan of Johor. 
e “certain outsider” was Dr Mahathir. 
’s words, said Tengku Sariffuddin, were embarrassing for all to hear and he would serve his nation better by retiring quietly.
